bibleStudy.title: Harvest Righteousness
bibleStudy.description:
A Bible study on the books of James.
We want you to love God's Word! Download this free, printable Bible Study for personal study or to use in a Bible study group. Roughly 15 minutes a day, for 4 weeks.
Group discussion questions are included.
This study is made to be shared! My passion is to have more people in God's Word. Feel free to send this to friends, or even print it for them. Feel free to use this study in church settings or Bible study groups. It is a great, no-cost way for more women to be in God's Word together!
I do ask that you do not sell any portion of this study. If you choose to post it on social media or other sharing platforms, please link back to my website.
Spiral binding is inexpensive, and is a great way to keep this together!
*Since these studies are avaible for free, I don't have editors checking over my work. I do the best that I can, and update the digital downloads when I find mistakes. If you find a mistake, please feel free to let me know!
May the Lord bless you and keep you,make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.May he turn his face toward you and give you peace! (Numbers 6:22-26)

bibleStudy.title: Perfect Love Casts Out Fear
bibleStudy.description:
We want you love God's Word! Download this free, printable Bible Study guide.
- 4 week study, 5 days each week
- 2 parts to each day encouraging worship in Spirit + Truth
- Roughly 15 minutes a day
May the Lord bless you and keep you,
make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.
May he turn his face toward you and give you peace! (Numbers 6:22-26)

bibleStudy.title: All Creation
bibleStudy.description:
We want you love God's Word! Download this free, printable Bible Study for personal study or to use in a Bible study group. Roughly a 15 minutes a day, for 4 weeks.
A "Going Deeper" section is provided for those who may want more study.Includes Scripture memory cards and group discussion questions.
This study is made to be shared! My passion is to have more people in God's Word. Feel free to send this to friends, or even print it for them. Feel free to use this study in church settings or Bible study groups. It is a great, no cost way for more women to be in God's Word together!
I do ask that you do not sell any portion of this study.If you choose to post it on social media or other sharing platforms, please link back to my website. I would sincerely appreciate you tagging me in posts about it!
Reccomemended Printing:
Print pages 1-2 and 53-54 double sided on cardstock
Print page 55 on card stock (Bible verse memory cards and book mark)
Print pages 2-11 double sided on regular paper You of course can print the whole thing on regular paper too!
Spiral binding is inexpensive, and is a great way to keep this together!
*Since these studies are avaible for free, I don't have a team of editors checking over my work. I do the best that I can, and update the digital downloads when I find mistakes. If you find a mistake, please feel free to let me know!
May the Lord bless you and keep you,make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.May he turn his face toward you and give you peace! (Numbers 6:22-26)

bibleStudy.title: Fruitful Abiding
bibleStudy.description:
We want you love God's Word! Download this free, printable Bible Study guide today. 10-15 minutes a day, 1 chapter of Bible reading, for 4 weeks. Includes Scripture memory cards and group discussion questions. Print as many copies as you want for personal use and to share with friends.
*Since these studies are avaible for free, I don't have a team of editors checking over my work. I do the best that I can, and update the digital downloads when I find mistakes. If you find a mistake, please feel free to let me know!
Reccomemended Printing:
Print pages 1-2 and 12-13 double sided on cardstock
Print page 14 on card stock (Bible verse cards and book mark)
Print pages 2-11 double sided on regular paper
May the Lord bless you and keep you,
make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.
May he turn his face toward you and give you peace! (Numbers 6:22-26)

bibleStudy.title: The Complete Bible in a Year Plan Floral
bibleStudy.description:
We want you love God's Word! Download this free, printable Bible plan.
Do you desire to read through the Word of God? Do it with this plan! Broken down into monthly and daily readings. Complete with a page designed for taking notes. Reccord what you learn and want to study more. Start any month of the year!
Printing Instructions for binding:
- Set up for double side printing
- Reccomended to print pages 1-2, 11-12 on cardstock
- Print 169 copies of pages 9-10 to have one side of a note sheet for each day's reading.
Printing Instructions for just the plan:
Print pages 3-8 double sided and laminate
May the Lord bless you and keep you,
make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you.
May he turn his face toward you and give you peace! (Numbers 6:22-26)
